data.eml:eml: A new species and new record of Polycystididae (Rhabdocoela: Kalyptorhynchia) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhong, Lin-Hong, Hu, Xiao-Zhou, Lin, Yi-Tao, Feng, Wei-Tao, Zhuang, Jie-Yi, Zhang, Yu, Wang, An-Tai (2018): A new species and new record of Polycystididae (Rhabdocoela: Kalyptorhynchia) from China. Zootaxa 4446 (1): 39-50, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4446.1.3
